title: Toward intimacy (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Stereotype (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Sexual behaviour
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped women
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Handicapped - Sexual behavior
description: A woman with a disability retains both her sexuality and her right to seek, develop and sustain a relationship with the partner of her choice. In this documentary, four disabled women from across Canada share their personal experiences and raise important issues including sexuality, self-esteem, stereotyping and parenting. It is their opportunity to say, "this is the way it is and not the way you think it is".
